Summary: silver rotating sphere about 10ft in diameter floating in one position for the duration of 20 minutes
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on our front porch when i happened to look up and see a silver sphere in the sky about 800 to a 1000ft in the air. I thought at first it was a baloon but noticed that it never moved even though there was a good breeze blowing at the time. I observed it for about 15 minutes when an airliner passed overhead and i noticed the object was between myself and the jet,thats when i got a good ideah of the size of the object floating in the sky. I went inside to get a camera and as soon as i brought it up to take a photo it literally shot off at such a high speed i could not even begin to calculate it. the object was approximately 10ft in diamter and appeared to be rotating,the surface also appeared to be like liquid silver. When it disappeared i knew that i had observed a UFO for the first time in my life and i was quite thrilled.
trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
